sentences.en: A A good encyclopaedia is a mine of information.
sentences.cn: 一部好的百科全书是一座知识宝库。 。

sentences.en: A good encyclopaedia is a mine of information.
sentences.cn: 一部好的百科全书是知识宝库。

sentences.en: A good encyclopaedia is a mine of information.
sentences.cn: 一部好的百科全书是一座知识宝库.

sentences.en: A Sherlock Holmes encyclopaedia has been published in Japanese.
sentences.cn: 一本日语的福尔摩斯大百科全书出版.

sentences.en: An encyclopaedia contains a lot of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 百科全书包含很多知识.

sentences.en: An encyclopaedia's-worth of knowledge feels trivialised when it can be generated with just a few strokes on the keyboard, just as the live chatter of the world becomes so much waste paper.
sentences.cn: 当仅靠敲打几下键盘就能创作出那样的作品时，一种百科全书式的学问感瞬间变得微不足道，正如同那对这个世界鲜活的唠叨变成这里的一堆废纸那样。

sentences.en: Encyclopedia Britannica - The New Encyclopaedia Britannica, 15 th Edition in 1993,32 Volume set, Deluxe.
sentences.cn: 不列颠大英百科全书, 第15版,1993修订本,全套32卷, 豪华装帧版.

sentences.en: He copied the relevant data out of the encyclopaedia.
sentences.cn: 他从百科全书中摘抄了有关资料.

sentences.en: He is just a walking Encyclopaedia Britannica.
sentences.cn: .那他简直是无知他只是个会走路的大英百科全书.

sentences.en: He was a walking encyclopaedia.
sentences.cn: 他是一部活的百科全书。

sentences.en: I have a set of encyclopaedia of music.
sentences.cn: 我有一套音乐百科全书.

sentences.en: I might do an eighth book for charity, a kind of encyclopaedia of the world so that I could use all the extra material that's not in the books ... we'll see!
sentences.cn: 我可能出于慈善的目的写第八本书，大概是有关这个世界的百科全书，这样我可以使用书中没能出现的所有额外材料······敬请期待！

sentences.en: I ought to have bought that encyclopaedia, but now it's not available.
sentences.cn: ([那时]我应该买下那套百科全书的, 可是现在却买不到了.)[有悔恨之意. ].

sentences.en: Melville incorporated in " Moby Dick " an exhaustive encyclopaedia of whaling lore.
sentences.cn: 梅尔维尔在《白鲸 》 中汇集了各种捕鲸知识.

sentences.en: The explanatory article in encyclopaedia is a kind of expository writing.
sentences.cn: 百科全书条目释文是一种权威性辞书的说明文字,其语言朴实、洁、谨.

sentences.en: The first book to turn to on that subject is the Encyclopaedia.
sentences.cn: 关于这个题目,首先应去查百科全书.

sentences.en: The new edition of encyclopaedia will appear in the bookstores next week.
sentences.cn: 新版百科全书下周就会在书店摆出来.

sentences.en: They were still driving away at the encyclopaedia.
sentences.cn: 他们仍在孜孜不倦地编写那部百科全书。

sentences.en: This is a revised edition of the encyclopaedia.
sentences.cn: 这是那部百科全书的修订版.

sentences.en: This is an encyclopaedia of philosophy.
sentences.cn: 这是本哲学百科全书.

words.tran_cn: 百科全书的；广博的；如百科辞典的
百科全书的知识；广博知识
